Invest in solar panels: Solar panels can be installed on your roof or walls to generate electricity and power your home or office. This will ensure that you have enough light during the day, even if the sun doesn't rise.
Use natural light: Make the most of the natural light that is available during the day. Open your curtains and blinds to let the light in, and arrange your furniture and decor to make the most of it.

Use artificial light: Invest in high-quality artificial light sources, such as LED lights, to provide enough light during the day. These lights can be placed strategically around your home or office to ensure that you have enough light.
Install skylights: Skylights can be installed in your roof to let in natural light during the day. This can be an effective way to ensure that you have enough light, even if the sun doesn't rise.

Use reflective materials: Reflective materials, such as mirrors or reflective paint, can be used to bounce light around your home or office. This can be an effective way to create the illusion of light, even if the sun doesn't rise.
